summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the drainage and wastewater system of The City of Seattle; adopting a system or plan of additions and betterments to and extensions of the drainage and wastewater system; authorizing the issuance and sale of fixed or adjustable rate drainage and wastewater revenue bonds for the purposes of paying part of the cost of carrying out that system or plan, refunding a portion of the City's outstanding drainage and wastewater system revenue bonds and providing a reserve for and paying the costs of issuing and selling the bonds authorized herein; providing for the terms, conditions, covenants and manner of sale of those bonds; describing the lien of those bonds and creating certain accounts of the City relating to those bonds.
